headline: Is Johnson Controls Still Attractive After 46% YTD Surge and Smart Buildings Momentum?
summary: If you are wondering whether Johnson Controls International is still worth buying after such a big run, you are not alone. This stock has quietly become one of the more interesting valuation puzzles in industrials. The share price recently closed at $115.28, with returns of 0.5% over the last week, 0.8% over the last month, 46.0% year to date and 182.9% over five years. These numbers can change how investors think about both upside and risk. Recent news flow has focused on Johnson Controls...
